Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1390 ENCLAVE PARKWAY, HOUSTON, Texas, 77077-2099, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sysco is the largest U.S. food-service distributor, boasting 17% market share of the highly fragmented food-service distribution industry. Sysco distributes over 400,000 food and nonfood products to restaurants (66% of revenue), healthcare facilities (9%), education and government buildings (8%), travel and leisure (5%), and other locations (14%) where individuals consume away-from-home meals. In fiscal 2021, 83% of the firm's revenue was U.S.-based, with 8% from Canada, 3% from the U.K., 2% from France, and 4% other.

value.name: Greg D. Bertrand
